text: Ini kedua kalinya saya ke trans bali bersama keluarga, yg pertama saya menginap di hotel, kali ini saya ingin mencoba menginap di villa. Tentu saya tidak akan ke sini lg bila pelayanannya kurang oke, atau kamarnya kurang nyaman. Villanya ada di belakang gedung hotel, bisa jalan kaki atau diantar naik buggy. Karena di bali banyak sekali pilihan hotel yg bagus2, ada beberapa alasan kenapa saya ingin kembali lg ke trans. Pertama, pelayanannya yang sangat baik dan responsif. Ini sih yang memang luar biasa. Kami datang disambut Mr. Alex, beliau adalah GM di sini, kami diberikan handuk kecil, minuman, lalu beliau bercakap2 dengan kami, memastikan kami akan mendapat pengalaman yang menyenangkan di sini (dan memang benar!). Saya bawa 2 anak yg masih kecil, mereka menawarkan baby cot sebelum saya minta, saat anak saya tak sengaja ngompol di sofa dan muntah di kasur, mereka langsung mengganti sprei, sofa pun diganti baru, walau waktu sudah malam mereka tetap merespon dengan cepat dan ramah. Setiap pagi sarapan di restoran, kami selalu disapa Mr. Mariusz, sebagai resort manager beliau suka keliling di restoran sambil menyapa para tamu dan menanyakan pendapat kami tentang makanan/ minuman pagi itu. Beliau memastikan semua karyawan bekerja dengan baik dan semua tamu puas. Kami juga sempat datang ke restoran untuk sarapan di atas jam 10.30 karena terlalu asik berenang di villa, walau restoran sudah tutup, mereka tetap melayani kami dan menawarkan menu spesial pada hari itu. Oh ya dan yang saya senang di sini tidak pelit air mineral dan tidak ribet kalau kami butuh tambahan handuk atau sesuatu, kalau butuh malam2 pun akan diantar dengan cepat. Kedua, kamarnya yang luas dan nyaman. Kalau di hotelnya waktu itu kami bisa menikmati bathtub di balkon, di villa kami punya kolam sendiri yang dibersihkan 2x sehari, semua ruangannya jg 2x sehari. Di villa kamar mandinya cukup luas, dan ada jacuzzinya. Ketiga, trans ini punya kolam renang yang ada pasir putihnya. Kalau males ke pantai, bisa main di sini, disediakan jg pelampung dan mainan untuk anak2. Keempat, ada kids club, anak saya suka sekali main di sini, kalau bosan di kamar dan kami sedang malas keluar, benar2 cocok sekali buat liburan keluarga. Kelima, saya suka di sini ada semacam air terjun buatan, cantik sekali, dan kami bisa melihat matahari terbenam dari lantai atas hotel ini, tidak perlu jauh2 ke pantai. Dan yang terakhir, di sini tidak membedakan tamu lokal atau luar, semua diperlakukan sama, dimanja seperti raja, ini penting buat saya karena saya punya pengalaman buruk di salah satu hotel yang lebih mengutamakan tamu luar daripada lokal. Apakah saya akan kembali ke sini? Tentu saja!!! Dan saya sudah merekomen ini ke keluarga dan teman2 saya, semoga bila kembali ke sini saya bisa mencoba menginap di celebrity suite. Terimakasih trans.

text:
For my 40th Birthday I wanted to sneak off with my little family & not cook or clean for at least a week! After much deliberation, we decided on Bali & The Trans, staying in a Celebrity Suite with our 2yo. Our experience exceeded our expectations in every way. I booked this room because it has separate living room to the bedroom & a swim up balcony so my husband & I could make the most of nap time... and it did more than that!! The room inclusions are awesome!! The buffet breakfast was amazing & had the same & different offerings every day. Fresh fruit in our room, afternoon tea every day in our room or the lobby & free-flow drinks from 5:30-7:30pm including tapas in the lobby, club lounge or rooftop bar! Hard to make the most of with little ones if they go to bed early but we still managed at least 2 drinks a day. And we took turns to go back for a third after our little one went to bed. And last but not least... 24 hour butler service... our amazing butlers Ami & Irma organized everything from our room needs to afternoon tea delivery times, massages, dinner by the Waterfall (which was incredible and only $55per head) & a babysitter!! These beautiful ladies really made our stay easy. Thank you Ami & Irma! 
We ate a lot in the restaurant because the food was delicious, very reasonably priced & lots of gluten free options. The chef is also happy to take special requests. 
The kids club was great! Secure, great staff & activities. The pool was beautiful & the sand area was a great way to play in & out of the water. We always got a couple of day beds easily & ate lunch by the pool every day. 
All the staff here are wonderful & were so kind to us. Even offering extra fruit & snacks for our 2yo. We have all been spoiled and have had such a wonderful time here. We can’t wait to come back!!
title: We love The Trans!

owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Wife and I chose to spend 5 nights in the Trans Villas,  for our first holiday in Seminyak,  and we weren't disappointed. We were conveyed to our villa by golf buggy where we were met by our butler Tode (pronounced Today). Tode has an air of confidence and assured us that nothing was too difficult for him and his team. On entering the villa a pathway surrounded by water leads to a lounge area, dining area, sundeck and then to the rooms. The rooms are spacious and very opulent, more 6 star than 5 star..there is a lot of natural light, lightly scented and a prevailing sense of peace and tranquility. The bathroom is large and laid out for couples with separate basins.  A spa bath is the main feature where I enjoyed many a relaxing massage. The main feature in the courtyard is the pool.  Long enough to do laps before breakfast or cooling off after lying in the sun.  Breakfast, lunch and high tea are available and delivered via butler service. I preferred to dine in the amazing restaurant attached to the villas. This is where I discovered the CEO and Managers wander amongst the diners introducing themselves and  making the diners feel welcome and special.  We thoroughly enjoyed our experience in our villa and are already contemplating returning in the new year.
title: Villa Perfection

owner_response.text:
Dear Thomas K,

“Villa Perfection” Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us through Trip Advisor as we truly value your positive feedback.

text:
Have thoroughly enjoyed an 11 night holiday staying at the The Trans Villa which is conveniently located adjacent to the Trans Resort Hotel . Having last been in Seminyak over 10 years ago the area has developed substantially now offering everything needed for a great holiday , outstanding nearby restaurants , chilled beach clubs , arts and craft shops and most important all the natural beauty Bali has to offer . Fortunately The Trans Villa Bali is a place of calm , quietness and perfect relaxation , despite being located very close to all the close attractions . The villa is very private , spacious and beautifully designed and decorated with a personal butler always on hand as required . We enjoyed afternoon tea , scones and cream and in the evenings cocktails and nibbles before dining . Food in the restaurant was delicious whether the international breakfast spread or a romantic evening dinner . The chef always happy to cater for vegetarian requests too . Enjoyed the impressive gym , Balinese spa , pool and watched an outdoor movie on giant screen by the pool one evening too . Used the nearby beach clubs and a late night or two, enjoying big name DJ’s - Diplo - by the sea . But best of all was using the Trans Villa as a base to explore the island and enjoy Beautiful Bali . For example Ubud was a 30 minute drive away . 
All the above makes for a great resort,  but what makes it exceptional was ALL the people . From the Managers through to the cleaning staff , the front desk to the concierge , the security to the pool boys  , the lounge and restaurant teams to the gym , spa and of course the butler team .  Every point of contact was seamless , passionate and full of warmth and personalized genuine service , all acting as empowered ambassadors ... really really impressive and world class . Thank you all .. we and our friends,  will be back to enjoy again soon.
title: Found a piece of heaven in Seminyak

text:
I am world traveller, and I this resort is one of the best places I have stayed in quite a while. The hotel is relatively new approx.  5yrs from the time of writing, and cover what our experience of the hotel.

We arrived on 16th of Sep 19 and left 26th, we come of very long flight from the UK via Singapore. My first suggestion is to arrange a taxi via the hotel, just drop them an email and they are happy to assist you. It takes the stress away when you land.

We arrived at the hotel a little early for checking, but we presented with some refreshing towels and welcome drink. The lobby it quite vast with multiple desks to help guests, a concierge and bar at the end of the lobby.
They actually allowed us to check in early which was much appreciated after a almost 24hr journey.

The rooms a very comfortable and amenities are some of the best I seen, I could have mostly left my toiletry bag and home an not noticed.  They have branded amnesties, such a Colgate, Gillette, Oral b, they if have hair brush, combs the list go on.

I really enjoyed a good soak/relax in the jacuzzi tub and there was never an issue with hot water.

Breakfast, normally for my wife this is well the challenges begin, she is vegetarian and normally when we go abroad she suffers.  However here she did not thanks to Eddie at breakfast special thanks, and to the other chefs,  they came to her ever morning with a smile on the faces to ask what she would like, every day there is station that is dedicated to some global cuisine, she normally just asked for veggie version of this. 

In terms of breakfast generally it was vast, there was fresh juices, highly recommend the green juice not the most appealing to look at but actually taste quite nice. Also the coffee is really good and as cappuccino lover had a couple of these every morning. The service at breakfast was always good, with multiple station, one that rotated every day. There where dedicated Chinese/Japanese station with dim-sum and noodles, dessert stations, and savories. We never left breakfast hungry, more like the opposite. 

The hotel maintenance is high and it is getting cleaning regularly the staff seem to be pride themselves in this and were all really friendly, I really liked the fact that they remember you name which is nice touch especially as I am terrible with names.

The spa and fitness centre is at the back of the hotel, the Spa is very good/clean and I am not know for message but we did a couple message and was reasonable priced. The gym is well equipped, separate jacuzzi and steam for men and woman.

There is only one restaurant but we just asked what we wanted to be cooked and they accommodate us which was amazing. We also really enjoyed the afternoon tea and evening drinks and highly recommend upgrading to club. Speaking of drinks I highly recommend the Marioshka, it is the signature cocktail of the resort manager, and I challenge you to tell if it has any alcohol in it, the wife who is not a big drinker loved it.

If you enjoy eating outside for dinner there are plenty of eateries. 

The pool is good too, slightly heated but do not expect a bath, there are two sections the main pool and then a sandy kids pool with a man made beach which is great if you have kids. The pools are divided by a innovate concrete bridge in the water but just enough to cover your feet as you cross. Although we do not have kids, lots people rave about the kids club.

The general activities are light with table tennis and the swimming pool, plus a few daily activities throughout the week. For evening there is live music in the lobby, but otherwise relatively quite. The TV choice was also a little limiting for my liking but to honest I not come for the TV.

Final note is there lot repeat guests from Aus so you can clearly see they been open for only around 5yrs and have got a lot of repeat customers which is always a good sign. I like to thank all the lovely and kind staff at the Trans that looked after so well that we did not feel like leaving, all way from management Alex, Mariusz, to the Chef and restaurant staff, concierge, housekeeping  Hardy,  Eddie, Indra, Tikka, Yobi (Terrible with names but the list goes on)

I would highly recommend this hotel and the staff a clearly looked after, we definitely stay here again, as we felt like this was home.

text:
I was staying at The Trans Resort, villa number 2 for 3 days. It was such a lovely trip. Although the villa need some minor upgrade (lawn need some trimming and vineyard at foyer needs some maintenance), but overall comfort is well maintained. Plus point is that the hotel provide twice a day room cleaning

The hotel staffs were really nice and helpful. If you stayed at their villa, you can request for breakfast in villa with no additional cost. Aqua di Parma bath amenities was provided for the villa guests.
title: Memorable stay

text:
From the moment you arrive at this fab resort its instant relaxation and calm whilst still being in an ideal location, close to everything and so many highly rated restaurants within a short walking distance.

Fabulous rooms with comfy beds and soundproofing with everything you could expect from a 5 star hotel. The staff here go out of their way to make sure they know each and every guest and very attentive. Very well kept in all regards.

Breakfast has everything you could want. A buffet style served by staff at each of the food stations to ensure you are kept safe and still get to enjoy a huge variety of options rather than a set menu. 

The hotel has a well equipped gym, beautiful pools, including a separate kids area and quick service for anyone wanting one of their delicious cocktails or snacks. The sunset bar on the top floor have great drinks and gourmet snacks and great for snapping some selfies and listening to chilled beats. We didn't want to leave.

Was amazed at the quality of food from their kitchen and housekeeping was faultless. Many years of travelling and can't fault this place for going above and beyond what we ever expected. 

Dana made our stay truly special after having a casual chat with us while waiting for a taxi and helped us plan what we were going to do during our stay and giving us valuable travel advice. Nothing was an issue. What a great manager to have on board.

I'd highly recommend this hotel to anyone wanting a stress free holiday in an incredible room and facilities. The Trans Resort attracts clientele wanting to relax and enjoy their surroundings rather than party which was a huge bonus for us. 

Thank you Dana and your staff for looking after us and all your other guests on our trip. You most definitely made this a highlight and would be delighted to revisit should we return to Bali.

Would highly recommend the spa services. Professional massages and treatments at reasonable prices which make a change from the street style services. Complete relaxation. We tried the massage and wine bath which was something different. Yet another area of the hotel that was a hidden oasis.
title: Amazing Stay in a Beautiful Resort with Perfect Service

text: Although the resort complex is located in a busy road but surprisingly the Trans villa has a tranquil ambience. It's very private and well designed. Each villa has a living room, dining room with kitchenette, bed room and bathroom with Kohler jacuzzi. All facilities are in premium qualities, from the bed linen, towel, to furniture. text: I stayed with my 5-yr old daughter for a week and she never wanted to leave. This was our third villa in our long holiday in Bali and it was a perfect mix of open-air private pool villa living with all the comfort of a 5-star hotel room. The in-villa breakfast was very enjoyable and always on time, and every single staff I came across during my stay was very professional and pleasant. The villa is huge but kept very clean everyday, and nothing was too much trouble. You can always order in food or groceries using Gojek or Grab and never have to leave the villa for anything. The best thing about this villa was little to none mosquitoes! It’s very surprising given that it’s rainy season in Bali. This was the first villa in Bali we saw that had no mosquito net over the bed but we slept uninterrupted every night. It was great. The only minus is its location being away from the beach but we had already spent 2 weeks on the beach before coming here so we didn’t miss it at all.

text:
Our family (two adults, two kids 10 and 5 years old) visited Trans for the second year in a row in July 2019. We loved it the first time so were happy to go back again. The hotel is so well positioned, walking distance to 'eat street, shopping and the beach (for a longer exercise). Also plenty of facilities around for laundry, sates & nasi goreng and supermarkets if you need to access. Nothing is too much trouble for the butlers - thank you Ami and butler team.

This time we split our time between the Celebrity Poolside suite (7 days) and a private pool villa (3 days). Once again the service was impeccable. Every need was catered for including, organising babysitting, booking restaurants, suggesting outings and venues.

The kids club was great again, especially for the 5 year old, with many different daily activities, including craft and face painting.
Pool side and room service always good and love the family and staff combined beach volleyball games by the pool.

Lots of choice for the buffet breakfast. We rarely ate at the restaurant in the evening, but poolside meals and beers were always plentiful and quick.

Many thanks once more to Komang, Devi and all their team for their continuing excellence in service to make all visitors feel at home.
We will be back in 2020 to enjoy more of your famous hospitality.
Mandy & Cam
title: The Incomparable Trans Resort - Feels Like Coming Home!

text:
While this is our third stay at the Trans Resort, we are always more and more impressed with everything this oasis provides! Starting with such a warm welcome by all staff, it’s clear that this is a resort that knows how to take care of its guests. The premises are immaculate and with it being located in the heart of Seminyak, you would be forgiven for feeling like you’re in an isolated paradise. Hotel rooms are spot on with all the amenities you could need. 

We stayed in a villa this time and had the added privelege of a superb butler service 24/7 who would attend to every need when needed (thanks Devi, you are wonderful). The buggy drive between the villa and hotel reception is a bit of fun too 😉 

If you can splurge that little bit more and include access to the Club Lounge you won’t be disappointed. With daily afternoon tea, free flow drinks and canapés each night for a couple of hours and truly genuine staff taking care of you it takes only moments to settle in and get comfortable. Oh and Norris, what a legend!

What sets the Trans even further apart from other hotels we’ve stayed at before finding it is the welcoming and personal attention given by Trans Director Alex and Resort Manager Mariusz. These gentlemen each went out of their way to spend time making my wife and I feel welcome in what could only be described as their home. Seeing that they treated each guest in the same way really was refreshing. 

Oh and to top it off, two words...The Mariuszka! One taste and your world will be changed 😬😜

text:
Great location and memorable experience!

My husband and I absolutely enjoyed our stay at Villa ( 3)  Trans and our stay by far exceeded all expectations.

The service/ with our own personal butler for all our needs was outstanding. All staff and Mr. Mariusz who is the Manager at the Trans , welcomed us with smiles and ensured that anything we might need throughout our stay-to let them know. Nothing was too much trouble to make this one of the best experiences we have ever had on any holiday.

Upon opening our villa door we were stepped into our very own private world…which was a very picturesque and tranquil in its beauty. The decor showed way this is first class inside and out.
Aside from the stunning villa the facilities within the Trans are amazing. The fully equiped gym is the best in Bali and the best part may be the change rooms which allow for the ultimate recovery. The feature of the change rooms are the hot and cold plunge pools which ensure you recover after a tough session in the gym.

And you might need a few sessions in the gym because the Buffett breakfast is the standard by which all other breakfasts in Bali are judged…very hard to beat.

I absolutely loved the rooftop sunset bar for afternoon drinks and VIP lounge which we used before heading out to dinner.  Our favourite drink was (The  Marioska ) A MUST TRY! 

We will definitely be back with the family next time, which by the way has an amazing kids centre that the kids would love.

Thank you so much for a wonderful experience you have provided us and lasting memories 😁

Kirsten & Corey Mckernan

text:
Again we enjoyed the Trans and had our last night in luxury comfort in the villas. First time in the villas and the trans definitely did not disappoint. It had everything necessary and what we enjoy so much in the hotel but with a little extra! Travelling with my mum and our friend who aren’t comfortable being in their bikinis in the public pool were able to enjoy a private pool, in the confines of the villa. We had a very accomodating personal butler who gave us a phone that we took with us around Bali to call her if we needed anything. Including the delicious breakfast being served in our villa at no extra cost! 
The buggy picked us up every time we left the villa. Not to mention the fancy automatic toilet 😆
My sister and enjoyed a relaxing bubble bath! And the bathroom had a his and her sinks which made it extra awesome for getting ready for our last night in Bali! 
Thank you Irma for serving us! Thank you Dana! Unfortunately for me I don’t think my mum will allow us to book anything but the villas for next time hahah
You will see us again! Thank you to all! 

Ps. Definitely a must when at trans to do the Thursday night romantic dinner! Worth every penny and possibly one of the most joyous nights we had, thanks to the staff, Indra (for talking us into it) and Smiley Norris!
title: Back again at The Trans

text:
We stayed in a villa at the trans resort for 6 nights for our honeymoon.
From the moment we arrived, we were blown away by just how friendly the staff are, and how much they want to do for you.

The villa it’s self is very spacious, the outdoor area is beautiful with a pool that is quite sizeable and an outdoor area which has a fridge and a coffee machine (fridge was great once we stocked it!). There is also an outdoor lounge and sun beds to relax yourself in.
Once inside the villa, the rooms are again very spacious, with a bed that’s fit for a king! The bathroom is bloody big as well and exceptionally clean.

With our stay, we had the resorts club lounge included which was absolutely fantastic, the staff that looked after us while we were there again could not do enough for us, with our drinks as soon as it was empty and back on the table they were with us for a refill or another drink. They were also incredibly helpful in pointing us toward very nice restaurants in the area.

The villa also comes with a butler who provides guests with a mobile phone to be able to contact them at any time with whatever needs you may require.
We really could not recommend the villas enough, between the facilities and they staff they made our honeymoon absolutely unforgettable!!

On our final night, we ran into the resort manager in the club lounge who upon learning it was our honeymoon without hesitation extended our checkout time from the already generous midday up to 5pm due to our flight. This is just one example of how all the staff are willing to help if they realise there is something that they can assist with.
title: Perfect getaway for our honeymoon

text:
I and my wife stayed at bali trans resort hotel for 7 nights and words cannot describe how amazing the room, facilities and services are! 

We absolutely loved the suite. The private jacuzzi and swimming pool makes it that bit more relaxing. Having your own private butler to attend to your service day and night makes it even more special! We utilised the in room breakfast service, the afternoon tea and the continuous recommendations of activities and restaurants advised by Devi, Irma, Ami & Cahya. Thank you all for your help!!! They deserve the highest of recognition! 

The team are very professional and at all times give their 100% into catering for your needs. 

The location of the hotel is in the heart of everything you need to reach in Seminyak! The security is tight which makes you feel more comfortable staying at this luxurious resort. 

Can I just say, the breakfast they serve all types of dishes and have their special each day which happens to change. We were lucky to have the full 7 day experience to taste all the delicious cuisines they have to offer. 

The Spa is probably one of the best Balinese massages we received in our two weeks in Bali. Nothing’s comes remotely close to it so make sure you use their service!  

The bed and pillows are really comfortable! Had the best sleep here in our whole trip and was glad we spent half our time here at this resort. 

If you want the luxury and comfort for your special trip, whether you’re a couple or a family with children, this place is for everyone!

Thank you trans hotel team for making our stay special and memorable!! 
 
Maf & Sadia
title: Amazing honeymoon stay in celebrity suite

text:
I’ve been to Trans Resort Bali 2 years ago, and I said to myself I will definitely go back here. This year 2019, my experience was even better. I stayed at their One Bedroom Villa, and it was our own little paradise. The interiors are very well designed with a luxurious Balinese ambiance. The bed was extra comfy and cozy facing the pool, huge living area, spacious bathroom with an enclosed large shower area and jacuzzi. The in-villa breakfast was also exquisite, very well presented, definitely the best way to wake up in Bali. Another great thing about Trans is they have their own fitness center, so you can still do your daily workouts even while on vacation. We also went to the rooftop bar, nice ambiance especially late at night. But really, the best thing that made our Bali experience great was the staff. I myself am working in a customer service industry, and I must say, the staff of Trans Resort really know how to take good care of their guests.

Thank you to the management of Trans Villa/Trans Resort, you definitely made our Bali vacation a memorable one.
title: Trans Villa Experience

text:
We were invited to stay at the Trans Resort for a 50th birthday.  As we had never been to Bali before, I wasn't sure what to expect.  I looked at the website photos before we committed and I really liked the photos.  Well when we arrived I am very happy to say that the resort and villas were exactly as the photos I had seen.  Actually even better that what I expected !  The resort lobby was so beautiful gracious and so clean.  The staff so impeccably dressed every single day.   The 3 bedroom Villa was just as spectacular with a large king size bed, very spacious bathroom with separate shower and separate toilet, double vanity with toiletries provided and replenished every day.  we had our own butler, a buggy on call whenever we needed it  or a short walk to the resort.  We had the choice of using our own large pool with deck chairs and entertaining area, or using the resort pool. Every day was a happy day being greeted by all the friendly staff. 
Buffet breakfast and all meals were amazing.  Brilliant chef.  Everything was so tasty and cooked well.  All staff going above and beyond to make sure we were satisfied.
A special mention to Ariana, Cha Cha, Gusti, Eka,Rani, Harumi and Tika.  
these guys along with all the other staff made our stay so memorable.  Thank you to Mariusz and Alex for being great leaders.   Will definitely be back.
title: Absolutely beautiful holiday

text:
The private villa at The Trans Resort has been the best family holiday ever! The villa included our own private pool surrounded by beautifully manicured gardens, outdoor shower and day bed. We have been spolit upon arriving and the attention to detail and care has been phenomenal. The rooms are massive and were easily able to cater for our family even and outdoor fridge to store all the bottled water provided. 
We have been well cared for by all staff, super friendly and kind. 
Special thanks to all of our butlers. 
Rani was excellent and so welcoming when showing us around the stunning villa on the first night following our flight from Australia. Rani continued to provide care, support and nothing was too much trouble.
Tude', Agung, Irma and Eka were amazing as well as they provided exceptional care to our family and certainly made the holiday memorable allowing all of us to relax. We could not fault the service, attention to detail and layout of the villa. 
We were pleasantly surprised upon returning to the villa after breakfast or dinner the rooms would be cleaned to perfection. We have been to many resorts and never have we had the pleasure of meeting with the General Manager Alex and Resort Manager Mariusz ever so proud of the resort and so welcoming which made us feel like part of the family. Mariusz entertained us and looked after us by making his famous "Marioska" cocktail absolute bliss to drink during the warm weather. We enjoyed the in villa  BBQ as our family and enjoyed all the different food and sauces to match. An amazing experience to cherish we  highly recommended! We enjoyed our massages and the care provided during our relaxing visit. The variety of food available at breakfast was amazing. Our boys enjoyed some time at kids club and the varierty of activities provided and the hours of operation for kids club created flexibility for us to enjoy dinner or a massage. This was our first time in Bali but it will not be our last! We can highly recommend the private villa at The Trans Resort.
title: The BEST Family Holiday EVER!

Where can you go to experience a piece of heaven? 
We have just spent 9 wonderful days there! Trans Villas Bali has been pure bliss from the wonderful, well appointed villa which is an indulgent haven too all the wonderful staff who will do anything to make your visit perfect. 
The villas are attached to the The Trans Resort so you have the benefit of all that it has to offer such as breakfast buffets, great restaurant with various types of foods, gym and spa.
The Villa itself is a hideaway where you wake to peace and quiet and either go and visit the local wonders  of Seminyak or rest and chill out by your own pool. Have an afternoon nap until your complimentary high tea arrives. Then head to the restaurant for a sumptuous meal
Apart from all the wonders of the villa itself the staff we have met have treated us as family. Those such as Irma, Agung, Eli, the beautiful Rani, Radit are villa treat you as family and always willing to help and make your stay special!
Norris, and Ariana in the restaurant have been attentive and friendly and the girls in the Club House amazing!!!
Mariusz and Alex the report managers should be proud of their staff as they go beyond and above to make a great stay perfect. 
We said we would be back last year and again we wouldn’t stay anywhere else as who can pass up on Heaven??

I was fortunate to stay at the Trans Hotel on our annual girl’s trip. It was my first visit, with most of the group having stayed previously so, the resort came highly recommended and certainly did not disappoint. We were lucky to stay in one of the luxurious villas with the bedrooms opening out to our own private pool and a personal butler, the beautiful Rani. All staff were so friendly yet totally professional, from the reception staff to the house keeping. Nothing was too much trouble and even the General Manager Alex and Resort Manager Mariusz introduced themselves to us and were so friendly and down to earth we feel we have made new friends. We were also introduced to Mariusz’s special signature drink “The Marioska” - a taste sensation and the perfect start to our evening out. I highly recommend the Waterfall dinner - an unforgettable open air dining experience with 6 courses of exquisite food. A guitarist and singer added to the atmosphere and encouraged us to request our favourite songs - a fantastic night!
The hotel location is perfect - close to spas, excellent restaurants and great shopping. All factors to consider for the perfect girl’s trip! Thank you all for an unforgettable, fabulous holiday.

text:
We have just come back from spending 5 nights in a Villa at the Trans! Wow…

The villas are private and comfortable although with the added benefit of being part of a resort with all the hotel facilities. The villas are located in a separate area away from the hotel which allowed us to have peace and quiet when we wanted it but then the fun of the hotel when we wanted that too. The villa pool was perfect for a cool dip throughout the day. We even had a few evening swims too which we loved after being out in the Bali heat. The pool was very clean and well maintained throughout the stay. 

The room is very comfortable with a huge bed, big pillows and a very spacious bathroom. We loved the products on the bathroom! 

It was a short walk through the gardens to breakfast although the staff were always ready with a buggy to take us. Breakfast was great with lots of variety and so many friendly staff willing to assist. 

Many days we spent time at the outdoor gazebo area with its coffee machine and fridge. Very private! We also have a BBQ in the villa with some other guests which our Butler organised. Fresh seafood and steaks!! it was so good. 

The service is extraordinary. I had so many great experiences, I’m reluctant to name individual staff member because every single person we met were so charming, pleasant and kind. This extends from the Hotel Managers, the private butler who was so discreet but always available, to the housekeepers, reception, restaurant staff and lifeguards. 

As part of this trip we spent another 5 nights at a fancy resort at Nusa Dua. Although another lovely modern, big resort although it didn’t rate even close to the Trans for service. 

We were so sad leaving the villa and can’t wait to go back. I know where our next booking will be.

text: The TRANS VILLA was beyond our wildest dreams. It has a HUGE lounge/dining area + a fully equipped kitchen This 3 bedroom villa is built around a sparkling and big swimming pool and has a large daybed. There were sunbeds around the pool and also an entertaining area with a large corner suite.The master bedroom is gigantic, with a great sitting area and a very huge double bathroom. All toilets are FULLY automated, front wash/ back wash, heated seats! All 3 bathrooms are large with a double spa bath. The furnishings are very classy and there are very nice artworks in the villa.Apart form the master suite there are 2 other beautiful bedrooms. All rooms have very high thatched ceilings,which adds to the feeling of space. Evenings are special sitting next to the sparkling pool with underwater mood lighting and nice water features. The air is balmy and fragrant due to the beautiful flowering plants and trees surrounding the high walls.You'll have your personal butler on call to serve you any time, to drive you to the restaurant or lobby on a buggy. All your washing and ironing is taken care of, and also have access to the club lounge serving high tea,hot and cold nibbles and free flow of drinks. Staff is professional, kind, keen to serve and support. They are guided by 2 fantastic managers. Alex,who is professional, kind and Mariusz  who is larger than life, genuinely loves people, has superb people skills and also a wonderful human being.Thanks! DON'T LOOK ANYWHERE ELSE THIS IS IT!

From the moment we walked in the entrance to the Trans Resort, we were thoroughly impressed. The interior decor was upscale yet warm and inviting and the personnel we encountered were all very pleasant and accommodating and wow, what a pleasant view from our balcony. 
The food was absolutely wonderful, from preparation to presentation, very pleasing. We especially enjoyed the special bar drinks. Our bartender was April...she makes the most delicious cocktails and is incredibly kind and warm! And the massage was fabulous and very relaxing! 
On our 3rd of 4 nights we received a call from one of the hotel managers named Rad. He offered us an upgrade to a villa for our last day of the honeymoon stay. We were greeted by our butler, Irma. She brought us to our villa and we were truly amazed of the beauty. She truly went above and beyond and we felt like a king and queen! I cannot express into enough words how wonderful Irma was to us!!! We immediately shared with our friends and family in America of our amazing experience with the resort!! I have been traveling for over 40 years and this is by far the beat place I have ever stayed...my husband agrees as well! We would definitely recommend The Trans Resort as a great place to come to relax and enjoy yourself.

text:
Best Bali experience EVER. In my experience over 40 years of coming hereTrans Resort Hotel is a stand out.   The rooms are luxurious and spacious and no detail is omitted in room service and care no matter what type of accommodation you my choose. This business runs like a well oiled wheel. The welcome is genuinely warm and friendly and without exception the staff in all areas are happy, efficient, eager to please and very helpful.   After a working lifetime in the hotel industry I was easily able to recognise outstanding management which is the key to any successful business. Happy workers-happy staff-happy customers. On that score may I congratulate Alex and Mariusz who must work very long hours as they are definitely hands on management, visible and available. LOVE the MariuszKa cocktail created by the man himself and the 6 course degustation by the waterfall is something definitely not to be missed if you’re a foody (less than half the cost of my home town!!!)
Thank you all at Trans... especially Norris, Cha Cha, Rani, Dana and so many others you can be VERY proud and you most certainly deserved your world class award you recently received.  Jan from Bunbury WA
title: WOW awesome!!!

text:
We stayed in the Trans Villa during our holiday in October 2019. We hve been in Bali 5x times and I need to say this was the most spacious and generous villa we have stayed. The single bedroom villa is 3x the size of villas in other 5* hotels in Seminyak. The pool is huge and well suitable for morning swim. 

We loved the rooftop bar, which has stunning sunset views. Do not forget to check out the hotel's signature drink Marisohka invented by the resort manager Mariusz. 

We loved the dinner in the hotel restaurant, especially the Asian fair which is a level above most other restaurants in Seminyak. If you looking for authentic Asian, The Trans is the place to go.

Last but not least, the massage at the hotel is amazing. They have very skillful masseuse and everything was spotlessly clean
title: The biggest one-bedroom villa in Seminyak!

text: 집같이 느껴지는 곳이었어요. 방은 너무나 넓었고, 모든 것이 다 편안했어요. 하지만 무엇보다도 직원들의 노력이 돋보이는 곳이었어요. 수영장 안내 직원인 Denis가 저와 잘 어울려주었는데요. 혼자 여행을 하는 상황이었지만 잡지나 음료도 챙겨줄만큼 절 잘 돌봐 주었어요. 스파에 일하는 직원들도 매우 프로다웠고 친절했어요. 발레시기 마사지는 휴가를 시작하기에 매우 좋았고, 너무나 편안했어요. 그리고 주변 상인들의 방해 하나 없이 해변가로 바로 갈 수 있어서 너무 좋았어요. 아침식사로 오믈렛과 프렌치 토스트를 먹어 보는 것도 잊지 마세요!! owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. KomangS256,

I write this response after numerous emails back and forth between myself and TripAdvisor. I really believe your review is mistaken identity for different property. Similar thing happen before where guests stayed in 2 or 3 properties on split holidays, and posted review on wrong property. If you can clarify few points Mr. KomangS256 I would really appreciate it:

1. Account Name - Reviewer account name is KOMANGS256 and region is Bali. This review is in Korean but 
    previous review of KomangS 1 year ago is in Bahasa Indonesia. Are you Indonesian or Korean SIR? If you are 
    Indonesian and writing on behalf of your guest.....that is actually not allowed under rules of Tripadvisor. If you 
    live in Bali why would you write in Korean? 

2. Location of the Hotel – You indicated that you had a direct access to the beach. Trans Resort Bali in on main 
    road and 2km from nearest beach. ( Wrong Hotel ???)

3. Employee Name – Pool staff was mentioned by name. “Denis” was supposedly helping you with packing drinks 
    and magazines. We don’t have Denis working for our hotel. ( We have supplied Tripadvisor with list of 
    employees. (  employee organization chart and no employee named Denis)

4. You mention in your review that you traveled alone. Our Records Do NOT show any single traveler in the month 
    of January from Korea staying in the villa. Our Korean market is mainly honeymooners who stay in our villas. 

Please come forward Mr. KomangS256 and clarify your review. I would really appreciate it. Your reviews is so complementary to us. You did not mention one wrong thing yet you scored us only 3 our of 5 which dropped us from position 1 to position 3. If we did something wrong, I would gladly apologize but if its mistaken identity, I dont believe its fair to punish us for another property.

Once again Mr. KomangS256, I look forward to your reply, so we can put this unfortunate event behind us.

Regards

Mariusz Mierzejewski
Resort Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

로비에 들어서자마자 다가오는 기대감과 더불어 "부기"라고 불리는 골프차를 타고 가까운 풀빌라에 도착했다
첫인상은 너무나 아름답다였다. 폭신한 침대와 아름답게 꾸며진 정원, 원두막등 마음에 들지않는 곳이 없었다. 이곳을 추천해주신 여행사대표님께 고맙다.
남은 이틀도 즐거운시간 보내고 갈 것 같다.
title: 발리 풀빌라는 이곳으로 "The Trans"

text:
昨年初めて利用してから、今後ずっとこちらにお世話になるつもりで今年もやって来ました。

ホテルのプール自体はそれほど大きくありませんが、砂浜のプールも有りリゾート感は満載です。

特に宿泊はヴィラをお勧めします。
プール付きのヴィラとしては色々なヴィラに宿泊しましたが、使い勝手が良くサービス抜群で
す。

別料金ですが、ヴィラでするバーベキューは特にお勧めです！！

最初から最後までスタッフが最低３名は付いて、サラダから始まりメインのバーベキュー、デザートに至るまで全て給仕してくれるので、凄く贅沢な気分になれます。

昨年もして凄く良かったので、今年もして頂きました。

日本人の宿泊客はとても少なく、日本語を話せるスタッフが殆ど居ないので、それを不便に感じられる方は無理かもしれません。

でも、本当にいつも笑顔で挨拶してくれるスタッフばかりで嫌な思いをした事が無いので、これからもずっと変わらずホスピタリティに優れたホテルであって欲しいなと思います。
title: トランスリゾートのヴィラは最高に素敵です！
